Title: Relates to electronic notification when prior authorization is required to fill a prescription
Summary: Requires insurers to provide electronic notification when prior authorization is required to fill a prescription if requested by the insured.
LawCode: Amd §§3217-a & 4324, Ins L; amd §4408, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the insurance law and the public health law, in relation to electronic notification when prior authorization is required to fill a prescription
